title: Chapter 1 - A Quiet Ceremony
summary: In a hall filled with dignitaries and hushed whispers, the legendary witch Tiinarsha prepares for a wedding that will finally close the long era of the Five Witches.

title: Afterword
summary: The author thanks readers and explains how the continuation novella bridges the events of the main Unnamed Memory series.

title: Extra - Serpent's Afterimage
summary: Late at night, Tiinarsha senses an echo of the ancient serpent she once defeated and investigates whether a remnant still lingers.
